sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词均有"死，死亡"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: die, decease, expire, perish, pass away
means: die ： 最普通用词，指某人或某物失去生命而永远不存在。
decease ： 正式用词，多指法律上的用语。
expire ： 委婉用词。从本义"从肺部吐出气来"引申为吐出最后一口气，断气而死。
perish ： 书面用词，多指夭折或不幸暴亡。

sentence.Network_en: Upon his decease the house will pass to his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他死后房屋归他太太所有.

sentence.Network_en: Upon your decease the capital will pass to your grandchildren.
sentence.Network_cn: 你一过世,资产就转到你孙子的名下.

sentence.Network_en: The general's decease left the army without a leader.
sentence.Network_cn: 将军死亡使这支军队群龙无首.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French deces, from Latin decessus 'death', past participle (used as a noun) of decedere 'to die'

means.word_mean: 1. the event of dying or departure from life;

sentences.sentence: "her death came as a terrible shock"
"upon your decease the capital will pass to your grandchildren"

means.word_mean: 1. pass from physical life and lose all all bodily attributes and functions necessary to sustain life;
